permitHolder: SUNSHINE DAY CARE OF MOTT HAVEN

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At the time child care service was providing care it has been determined that the child care service failed to limit areas used by children to their exclusive use Unauthorized children and/or adults allowed to inhabit child care service facilities during child care hours
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection records of enrolled childrens periodic medical examination were not provided or maintained
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations

violations.Violation Summary: Milk observed stored at a temperature above 41 deg F at time of inspection Milk observed stored in child care service beyond the expiration date
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Safe sleep environment not provided in infant toddler service safe sleep environment does not comply with US CPSC and ASTM standards
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection heating apparatus was observed being used without appropriate guards Restricted space heater observed being used
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Safe sleep environment not provided in infant toddler service safe sleep environment does not comply with US CPSC and ASTM standards
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection diaper changing counter not properly constructed Diaper changing area observed not to be adjacent to a hand wash sink with adequate hot and cold running water
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Exits and other egress not provided with required signage at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
